snippet.title: The Hexadome: Aristeia Showdown - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Jump into The Hexadome, a 1v1 turn-based tactics game where you control a team of 4 champions fighting with live weapons to entertain their fans! In the hex grid arena, position your champions strategically, create synergies, and give the crowd a brutal show! Use the crowd's cheers to unlock your ultimate attacks, influence the course of the game and dominate The Hexadome!

✨ Coming to Steam & Steam Deck on Early Access this summer! ✨ 

✅ Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1498550?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=trailer 
🎮 Beta playtests every month! Register here: https://www.thehexadome.com
💬 Be part of our Discord community: https://discord.gg/Blindspot
📱 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blindspot_games 
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/Blindspot_Games 

The Hexadome is based on Aristeia, the brutal sports-show board game set in Corvus Belli’s Infinity Universe.

© 2024. All rights reserved. Developed by Blindspot Games.
https://www.blindspot-games.com
